localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: VECA is our plug and play, prebuilt intent recognition system for post-sales eCommerce support. Trained on 10 million user queries, automate your conversations with just a click.
blogPost.body: VECA is our plug and play, prebuilt intent recognition system for post-sales eCommerce support. Trained on 10 million user queries, automate your conversations with just a click.
blogPost.title: VECA - Your eCommerce assistant
blogPost.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: VECA是我们即插即用、预建的意图识别系统，用于售后电商支持。训练了1000万用户的查询，只需点击一下就可以自动对话。
VECA是我們即插即用、預建的意圖識別系統，用於售後電商支持。訓練了1000萬用戶的查詢，只需點擊一下就可以自動對話。

previous.excerpt: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them — without storing or sending them anywhere.
previous.title: Thought Detox - Private notes to clear your mind

localize.description: 将你的负面想法写在纸上，然后丢弃，可以帮助你找到平静。Thought Detox将这种体验带到你的iPhone上，让你写出你的想法，然后释放它们--无需存储或发送它们到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人笔记，让你头脑清醒

localize.description: 將你的負面想法寫在紙上，然後丟棄，可以幫助你找到平靜。Thought Detox將這種體驗帶到你的iPhone上，讓你寫出你的想法，然後釋放它們--無需存儲或發送它們到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人筆記，讓你頭腦清醒

next.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
next.title: Pageturner - Let's build a reading habit, together

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

localize.description: Pageturner是一個免費的社區，爲讀者和人們建立他們的閱讀習慣。公開閱讀和分享你的筆記，讓你發現有趣的想法，並讓你負責任。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起養成閱讀的習慣吧
